Text: Not only is this useful software, it is also UNIQUE software in that it is the only application out there that does what this does.  Which is why they can get away with charging $300 USD for 5MB of data.  It has its limitations, but I'm putting it out there for the sake of healthy competition.  Hopefully making it more readily available will inspire others to make similar software to compete with this monopoly.
